ComicInfo.Summary: Death Metal: An Anti-Crisis Part V The Man of No Tomorrow: Now possessing the Anti-Crisis energy, the Darkest Knight plans to kill Perpetua and re-make the Multiverse to his own dark version. The heroes are joined by Luthor and the Legion of Doom to come up with a plan save the Multiverse that involves leading an army of heroes, villains, and dead heroes against the Darkest Knight.
ComicInfo.Teams: The Titans,Green Lantern Corps,Justice League of America,New Guardians,The Terrifics,Legion of Doom,Hawk & Dove
ComicInfo.Title: Death Metal: An Anti-Crisis Part V The Man of No Tomorrow
